New Records: The Oklahoma City Thunder won their 11th straight game
The Thunder set a new record with 9 blocks in the game
Key Match Events: The Thunder outscored the Grizzlies 42-19 in the second quarter
Oklahoma City converted 21 Memphis turnovers into 33 points
The Thunder had a 32-9 run in the third quarter
Pre-Game Insights: The game was highlighted as a matchup of Western Conference leaders
The Thunder and Grizzlies were both near the top of the conference standings
Post-Match Reflections: The Grizzlies struggled without their star players Ja Morant and Zach Edey
Memphis had a poor shooting night with 38.1% from the field and 27.5% from three-point range
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder outscored the Grizzlies 56-36 in the paint
The game was effectively decided by halftime as the Thunder led 76-50
